alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 19 at 2:27PM MST until March 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON PDT /NOON MST/ SUNDAY TO 6 PM PDT /6 PM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Arizona, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From noon PDT /noon MST/ Sunday to 6 PM PDT /6 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
